name: Crazy Shopping
description:
The time is money.

What a nice word ...

The time of life is limited.

Do you know?

I just want to tell you one thing.

End shopping quickly, accurately, and brilliantly.

──────────────────
[Your Objective]
Go to the cash register at the fastest speed and finish.

[User Guide]
■Menu
↑←↓→:Move
Enter key:Confirm

■Game
W.A.S.D key:Move
Left Shift:Jump
R:Reset
Space key:dash

-Compete for how fast you can run through the shopping center.
